00055 TernaryLineDiagram::TernaryLineDiagram ( QWidget* parent,
00056                                          TernaryCoordinatePlane* plane )
00057     : AbstractTernaryDiagram( new Private(), parent, plane )
00058 {
00059     init();
00060     setDatasetDimension( 3 ); // the third column is implicit
00061 
00062     DataValueAttributes dataValueAttributes;
00063     dataValueAttributes.setVisible( true );
00064     MarkerAttributes markerAttributes;
00065     markerAttributes.setMarkerStyle( MarkerAttributes::MarkerCircle );
00066     markerAttributes.setVisible( true );
00067     dataValueAttributes.setMarkerAttributes( markerAttributes );
00068     attributesModel()->setDefaultForRole(
00069         KDChart::DataValueLabelAttributesRole,
00070         qVariantFromValue( dataValueAttributes ) );
00071 }

00086 void  TernaryLineDiagram::paint (PaintContext *paintContext)
00087 {
00088     d->reverseMapper.clear();
00089 
00090     d->paint( paintContext );
00091     // sanity checks:
00092     if ( model() == 0 ) return;
00093 
00094     QPainter* p = paintContext->painter();
00095     PainterSaver s( p );
00096 
00097     TernaryCoordinatePlane* plane =
00098         (TernaryCoordinatePlane*) paintContext->coordinatePlane();
00099     Q_ASSERT( plane );
00100 
00101     double x, y, z;
00102 
00103     int columnCount = model()->columnCount( rootIndex() );
00104     QPointF start;
00105     for(int column=0; column<columnCount; column+=datasetDimension() )
00106     {
00107         int numrows = model()->rowCount( rootIndex() );
00108         for( int row = 0; row < numrows; row++ )
00109         {
00110             // see if there is data otherwise skip
00111             QModelIndex base = model()->index( row, column );
00112             if( ! model()->data( base ).isNull() )
00113             {
00114                 p->setPen( pen( base ) );
00115                 p->setBrush( brush( base ) );
00116 
00117                 // retrieve data
00118                 x = qMax( model()->data( model()->index( row, column ) ).toDouble(),
00119                           0.0 );
00120                 y = qMax( model()->data( model()->index( row, column+1 ) ).toDouble(),
00121                           0.0 );
00122                 z = qMax( model()->data( model()->index( row, column+2 ) ).toDouble(),
00123                           0.0 );
00124 
00125                 double total = x + y + z;
00126                 if ( fabs( total ) > 3 * std::numeric_limits<double>::epsilon() ) {
00127                     TernaryPoint tPunkt( x / total, y / total );
00128                     QPointF diagramLocation = translate( tPunkt );
00129                     QPointF widgetLocation = plane->translate( diagramLocation );
00130 
00131                     if ( row > 0 ) {
00132                         p->drawLine( start, widgetLocation );
00133                     }
00134                     paintMarker( p, model()->index( row, column ), widgetLocation );
00135                     start = widgetLocation;
00136                     // retrieve text and data value attributes
00137                     // FIXME use data model DisplayRole text
00138                     QString text = tr( "(%1, %2, %3)" )
00139                                    .arg( x * 100, 0, 'f', 0 )
00140                                    .arg( y * 100, 0, 'f', 0 )
00141                                    .arg( z * 100, 0, 'f', 0 );
00142                     d->paintDataValueText( p, base, widgetLocation, text );
00143                 } else {
00144                     // ignore and do not paint this point, garbage data
00145                     qDebug() << "TernaryPointDiagram::paint: data point x/y/z:"
00146                              << x << "/" << y << "/" << z << "ignored, unusable.";
00147                 }
00148             }
00149         }
00150     }
00151 }
00152 
00153 const QPair< QPointF, QPointF >  TernaryLineDiagram::calculateDataBoundaries () const
00154 {
00155     // this is a constant, because we defined it to be one:
00156     static QPair<QPointF, QPointF> Boundaries(
00157         TriangleBottomLeft,
00158         QPointF( TriangleBottomRight.x(), TriangleHeight ) );
00159     return Boundaries;
00160 }
